faq.question: What is Clean Energy Consultants (CEC)?
faq.answer: Clean Energy Consultants is a leading hydropower consultancy firm in Nepal specializing in feasibility studies, engineering design, environmental assessment, and project management for renewable energy projects.

faq.question: What services do you provide?
faq.answer: We provide comprehensive services including hydropower development, solar energy projects, wind energy assessment, environmental impact studies, infrastructure design, and project consulting.

faq.question: How many projects has CEC completed?
faq.answer: CEC has successfully completed over 50 projects with combined capacity exceeding 1,000 MW across Nepal.

faq.question: How long has CEC been in operation?
faq.answer: CEC was founded with 25+ years of cumulative experience in the hydropower and renewable energy sector from its founding team.

faq.question: What qualifications do your team members have?
faq.answer: Our team comprises experienced engineers, geologists, environmental specialists, and financial experts with advanced degrees from reputed international and national institutions.

faq.question: How can I book a consultation?
faq.answer: You can schedule a free 15-minute counseling session by clicking the 'Book a Free 15-min Call' button on our website or contacting us through the contact form.
